caption.p: (a) Schematic of an experimental cell for multimodal characterization of Pt NPs, (b) particle size distribution and average particle sizes, as obtained from STEM and XAFS, and (c) evolution of the number density of Pt species, as obtained by contrasting the results in panel b.
